name: customcommand
description: Add or remove basic custom commands

options.name: add
options.description: Add or update a custom command.

options.name: command
options.description: The name of the new custom command.

options.name: response
options.description: The response that will be sent when this command is used.

options.name: restrictedTo
options.description: If provided, this command will only be enabled for users with this specific role.

options.name: command
options.description: The name of the custom command to be removed.
